ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, I agree George If you have noticed, everybody seems to be taking a turn for the positive! Save for the KSer guy.  hehe -- Lim Dul ... Date: Sun, 13 Jun
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, I agree George

If you have noticed, everybody seems to be taking a turn for the positive!
Save for the KSer guy. hehe

-- Lim'Dul

>Message: 1
Date: Sun, 13 Jun 1999 12:22:34 -0700
From: "George Holt" <georgeh@...>
>Subject: Gripes....

>Hello... I have subscribed to this list for about 2 months now... and I
>think
>it's about time someone said something.

>I am tired of wizards using this list for griping about class problems. I
>know
>that it is not uncommon. The eq_bards list does it as well... But isn't it
>time
>that we said... ok enough... I'm tired of emails that just flame verant.
>It's
>getting to the point where even the emails that try to be constructive
>still
>irritate me...
